 I. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קוּץ‎</span>] **verb** ==feel a loathing, abhorrence, sickening dread== (\|\| √of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קוט‎</span>; [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קוּץ‎</span> ***id.***; for connection of meanings compare Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎קְנַט‎</span> ***loathe***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***fear***); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָ֫צָה‎</span> [[Num.21.5|Num 21:5]] 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קַ֫צְתִּי‎</span> [[Gen.27.46|Gen 27:46]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיָּ֫קָץ‎</span> [[Num.22.3|Num 22:3]]; [[1Kgs.11.25|1Kgs 11:25]] (but see below); 2 masculine singular jussive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תָּקֹץ‎</span> [[Prov.3.11|Prov 3:11]] 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וָאָקֻץ‎</span> [[Lev.20.23|Lev 20:23]] 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיָּקֻצוּ‎</span> [[Exod.1.12|Exod 1:12]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָץ‎</span> [[Isa.7.16|Isa 7:16]] — 

**1.** ***feel a loathing*** at, ***abhor***, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> of thing [[Num.21.5|Num 21:5]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]), [[Gen.27.46|Gen 27:46]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), [[Prov.3.11|Prov 3:11]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָאַס‎</span>); with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> person [[Lev.20.23|Lev 20:23]] ([[BDB#H|H]]; subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>); so [[1Kgs.11.25|1Kgs 11:25]], but [[BDB#Kit|Kit]] (after [[BDB#Syr|ᵑ6]], compare [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]]) proposes <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַ֫יָּצֶק‎</span> (√ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צוק‎</span> **Hiph\`il** ***distress***). 

**2.** ***feel a sickening dread***, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִפְּנֵי‎</span> person [[Exod.1.12|Exod 1:12]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Num.22.3|Num 22:3]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), [[Isa.7.16|Isa 7:16]]. **Hiph\`il** ***Imperfect*** 1 plural suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְקִיצֶנָּה‎</span> [[Isa.7.6|Isa 7:6]] (suffix of Judah) ***let us cause her sickening dread***, but weak, read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְצִיקֶנָּה‎</span> (√ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צוק‎</span>) [[BDB#Thes|Thes]] [[BDB#Che|Che]] [[BDB#Du|Du]] [[BDB#Gr|Gr]] [[BDB#Marti|Marti]]. — Other **Hiph\`il** forms see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קיץ‎</span>.
